extDesc.message: This extension allows you to control Deezer from your browser: hot keys, popup, notifications... it's all there!

showNewItemsTitle.message: Open the options page to see what's new

options_page_tab_welcome_content_present.message: With it, you can quickly pause, resume or navigate through the music currently playing on Deezer. It provides:

options_page_tab_welcome_content_item_1.message: A popup, which displays the album cover, track title and artist name

options_page_tab_welcome_content_item_4.message: Several misc options to make your life easier

options_page_tab_welcome_contact_me_at.message: Want more? Drop me a line at

options_page_tab_popup_what_are_popups.message: The popup shows the currently playing song; it also provides easy access to the most needed controls.

options_page_tab_notifs_what_are_notific.message: See which song is currently playing, control Deezer, all that without even opening the popup! You can choose when to display a notification, so that it's never in your way.

options_page_tab_notifs_chrome_permissio.message: Permission to display notifications not granted!

options_page_tab_notifs_show_never_hides.message: Keep notifications in the system tray as long as a Deezer tab is opened.

options_page_tab_notifs_show_on_song_cha.message: Show notifications any time an event occur (previous, next, play/pause).

options_page_tab_notifs_show_on_hotkey_o.message: Show notifications on hot key events only (i.e. not on button click in the popup or on Deezer).

options_page_tab_notifs_activate_explana.message: When activated, the notifications will live in the system tray. You can always force a redisplay by using the hotkey for 'show me current song'.

options_page_tab_hotkeys_what_are_hotkey.message: Control Deezer straight from you keyboard with hot keys! You can choose any combination of keys to match your preference: the default are the media keys, but don't let that stop you!

options_page_tab_hotkeys_activation_hot_.message: To activate this feature, Deezer Control needs to be able to listen to key combination on any web site you visit, thus the warning given by Chrome. Deezer Control doesn't read any of your data.

options_page_tab_hotkeys_whatZatSongHotK.message: Hot key for 'show me current song'

options_page_tab_hotkeys_warning_whatZat.message: Only works if notifications are active.

options_page_tab_hotkeys_jumpToDeezerHot.message: Hot key for 'jump to Deezer tab'

options_page_tab_hotkeys_warning_jumpToD.message: Press once, go to Deezer tab. Press twice, go back to active tab.

options_page_tab_hotkeys_warning_illegal.message: Please use the provided buttons to set the modifiers keys

options_page_tab_misc_what_are_misc_opti.message: Misc options to tweak Chrome to make your Deezer life easier.

options_page_tab_misc_limit_deezer_to_on.message: If this option is set to yes, Deezer can only be opened in one tab at a time. That tab will become active any time you try to navigate to Deezer on any other tab.

options_page_footer_not_endorsed.message: Deezer Control is not endorsed by Deezer
